Title: Gangs of Little Havana/Execution in Coconut Grove
Plot:
LOCATION: MIAMI
In the opening episode, investigators in Miami attempt to solve two brutal shootings committed at point-blank range.
In the first case, GANGS OF LITTLE HAVANA, the team finds a young man lying dead on the sidewalk in Little Havana near an area noted for gangland violence. From the outset the murder appears to be the latest tragedy in the turf war between two gangs. At first the investigating team is hampered by a wall of silence from a frightened community.
